column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent

#Text=And so I had literally campaigned in all 92 counties for two years of my life , driving around the state of Indiana in my American-made Honda Civic , which became a political issue for part of the race .
#Text=During that race , Congressman Luke Messer was part of the field for a time .
#Text=Diana Cordray , the clerk treasurer at Carmel , was in part of the field for a time .
#Text=Kent Benson was a big part of it .
#Text=Campaigning against him was like campaigning against Elvis Presley .
#Text=Because we ’d go to these southern Indiana counties , and he would autograph basketballs with the starting five in the 1976 Indiana University National Championship team .
#Text=And that was the time that I said I had to do something because he was killing me politically , and so we started putting our name on peanut butter and passing out peanut butter .
#Text=We said that if peanuts were the food of elephants , then peanut butter was the food of the grassroots of the Republican party , whose symbol was the elephant .
#Text=So we , we ran hard .
#Text=We ran a strong campaign .
#Text=And really it was that campaign that created the foundation for my ability to become a senator .
#Text=But there 's no question that that was a hard-fought campaign , and the way that it ended was less than favorable .
#Text=Literally , the next day I had to get on an airplane to fly to Camp Shelby , Mississippi to do my 2 weeks of army training in the middle of nowhere .
#Text=And I remember being on a rifle range , and a there was misfire happening , and I looked up to the safety officer on the rifle range and I said , " Was that Richard Mourdock over there ? "
#Text=Obviously , they did n't get the joke .
#Text=But Richard and I are now friends and get along great .
#Text=Tew :
#Text=And , in fact , you were both competing for [ Senator Richard ] Lugar 's office .
#Text=Well , you ’re talking about the United States Senate , this last go ‘ round ?
#Text=Yes .
#Text=Yeah , at the time I was finishing up my legal studies and kind of transitioning professionally .
#Text=I was running my own home-based business called MA Advisory Group , which was based upon my grandfather 's name of his company , the MA Delph Company , which I mentioned before .
#Text=And I had thought about that for a little bit .
#Text=I had been approached by some folks out in Washington , D.C. , specifically that I have known for years and that had an interest in me considering that .
#Text=And it really was n't a good time for me professionally and in the life of my family .
#Text=And so it was n't something that I ever formed a committee or raised money or , started campaigning or reaching out to people to build support .
#Text=But it did get in the press .
